subject: Re: [junit] Re: newb question - could not find class
msgSnippet: ... I vote this for the greatest message by a newbie in the history of this mailing list. -- J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger :: http://www.jbrains.info Your guide to
messageBody:
John Coppinger wrote:

> Here's what I did wrong: The README clearly says not to put
> junit-4.1.jar in the extensions
> directory.
>
> But did I pay attention to this? No I did not. Consequently, the
> classloader for extension jars
> couldn't find the test class files on the CLASSPATH.

I vote this for the greatest message by a newbie in the history of this
mailing list.
--
J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger :: http://www.jbrains.info
Your guide to software craftsmanship
JUnit Recipes: Practical Methods for Programmer Testing
2005 Gordon Pask Award for contribution Agile Software Practice
